skins.selfIntroduction: (I wanna give a cool self-introduction, but I don't have many exploits to my name... I did escort Dunkerque and Algérie, though that's not much...) Long story short: I'm Vauquelin from the Vichya Dominion! I've got more potential than you can imagine! C-cool, am I right?
skins.acquisition: Tadaah! Nameship of the Vauquelin-class large destroyers, Vauquelin, has arrived in style! Hey, what's so funny? I may not look strong, but I am! Um, probably!
skins.login: So, Commander, didn't you promise you'd return with snacks for me? Uhh, what? We never made any promise like that?
skins.details: Oh gosh! D-don't just appear outta nowhere, Commander... You'll scare people.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You look bored and in need of some relief, Commander. Perchance you would fancy a showcase of my lancing skillC Oh gosh, careful! You'll get hurt!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Can I ask you a favor, Commander? Well, I was hoping you could, uhh... leave out the bell peppers from my dinner tonight...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Aah, so it's like that, huh. I understand everything now. Let me take it on... NOT!
skins.secretaryTouch: What's up? Need me to do you a favor?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're making me a bit uncomfortable, Commander...

skins.shipDescription: Commandeeer! What are you doing? It's our day off! Turn the work part of your brain off and just have fun! C'mon, let's enjoy ourselves on the beach!
skins.acquisition: Commandeeer! What are you doing? It's our day off! Turn the work part of your brain off and just have fun! C'mon, let's enjoy ourselves on the beach!
skins.details: Tartu's not gonna get washed away by a stray wave, I hope... Yeah, figured as much...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Everyone's looking so cute~! Woo~! Hm? I'M looking cute too...? W-woo~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Isn't it great to just forget about work and have a good time~? But, uh, what's up with that Royal Knight over there? She's casually playing around too, even though she's still on duty...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Beach barbeque! Heck yeah! I'd love to grill some vegetables, but I'd rather someone else does the bell peppers!
skins.secretaryTouch: Teehee~ Well? How do you like my swimsuit~? Yeah, I know, I'm flat in a few places...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I know I don't hold a candle to Tartu, but... Wait, what do you think you're doing?!
